title: Real-Time Messaging
desc: Chat instantly with your friends and loved ones. See when they're online, when they're typing, and enjoy smooth, uninterrupted conversations.

title: Group Chats
desc: Create and manage group conversations effortlessly. Share messages and updates with multiple friends at once, and stay connected with your communities.

title: Image Sharing
desc: Share your favourite moments instantly. Send photos directly in your chats, create albums, and let your friends view and comment in real time.
